title: Base Overview
sub_title: Commander, please familiarize yourself with the base first ~

title: Base Introduction
sub_title: Commander, this is your office.

title: Commander Messages
sub_title: Here you can peruse your personal messages and appoint your adjutant.

title: Armory
sub_title: Here in the Armory, you can browse through the Dolls, equipment and items in your possession.

title: Shop
sub_title: You can buy whatever you want in the Shop.

title: MAIL
sub_title: Remember to check your mail regularly.

title: Rank
sub_title: Check the ranking board and learn from other Commanders!

title: QUEST
sub_title: When you're not sure what you should be doing, check your quests!

title: Setting
sub_title: You can change the game settings according to your needs.

title: INDEX
sub_title: You can access detailed information about both T-Dolls and enemies here.

title: Raising T-Dolls
sub_title: You need to know this to strengthen your Tactical Dolls.

title: T-Doll Introduction
sub_title: Learn about the characteristics of different Tactical Dolls.

title: T-Doll Acquisition
sub_title: Obtain more T-Dolls to improve the performance of your echelons.

title: T-Doll Leveling
sub_title: There are multiple ways to gain experience and level up your T-Dolls.

title: T-Doll Enhancement
sub_title: Enhance your T-Dolls to increase their stats.

title: T-Doll Repair
sub_title: Please repair your damaged T-Dolls promptly.

title: Dummy-Linking
sub_title: Dummy-Linking your T-Dolls can improve their performance in battle and increase their EXP gain.

title: T-Doll Retirement
sub_title: You can obtain resources by dismantling T-Dolls. High-rarity Dolls yields bonus cores.

title: Skill Training
sub_title: Careful use of your T-Dolls' skills can make or break a battle.

title: Affection
sub_title: You can increase your T-Doll's Affection by doing these.

title: Costume Special Effects
sub_title: It doesn't actually serve any purpose, but your Dolls will look more adorable.

title: T-Doll Costumes
sub_title: Even though you're busy fighting, don't forget to buy your Dolls new clothes.

title: Neural Upgrade
sub_title: Limit-Break your T-Dolls.

title: A Guide to Equipment
sub_title: Proper assignment of equipment will improve combat effectiveness.

title: Equipment Types
sub_title: Understand the features of different types of equipment and which Dolls they are compatible with.

title: Equipment Usage
sub_title: Using equipment wisely on your T-Dolls will make battles a lot easier.

title: Equipment Production
sub_title: Produce equipment in the Factory.

title: Equipment Enhancement
sub_title: Enhance your equipment to increase their stats.

title: Equipment Calibration
sub_title: This gives an opportunity to change the stats on your equipment.

title: Tactical Fairy
sub_title: Bring Tactical Fairies into the fight!

title: Fairy Types
sub_title: Different Fairies have different uses.

title: Fairy Production
sub_title: You can obtain Fairies from Equipment Heavy Production.

title: Fairy Leveling
sub_title: Fairies also gain EXP in battle when equipped to echelons.

title: Fairy Skills
sub_title: Train your Fairies' skills to improve their effects.

title: Fairy Calibration
sub_title: You can change a Fairy's Talent through Calibration.

title: Fairy Enhancement
sub_title: Enhance your Fairies to improve their performance in battle.

title: Fairy Chamber
sub_title: You can manage all Fairy-related facilities in the Fairy Chamber.

title: HOC
sub_title: Now that the Heavy Ordnance Corps have been rolled out, we might be able to turn the battlefield situation around.

title: HOC Introduction
sub_title: HOC can provide powerful fire support.

title: HOC Research
sub_title: Research and develop HOC by analyzing data.

title: HOC in Battles
sub_title: HOC may possess impressive firepower, but they are not capable of fighting on their own.

title: HOC Enhancement
sub_title: Please continue to enhance your HOC!

title: HOC Circuits
sub_title: Insert new chips into the HOC's circuit to improve their performance in battle.

title: HOC Skills
sub_title: The HOC's skills need to be trained.

title: HOC Iteration
sub_title: Fully-leveled HOC can still be improved.

title: Garage
sub_title: You can access and manage your HOC in the Garage.

title: Intelligence Center
sub_title: Analyzing samples at the Intelligence Center is the best way to obtain HOC.

title: Combat Missions
sub_title: Understand and challenge a wider variety of combat missions.

title:
Combat
<SIZE=25>Mission</SIZE>
sub_title: Progress through main storyline missions.

title: Night
sub_title: Your field of vision is very important during night missions.

title: Auto-Battle
sub_title: T-Dolls can proceed with missions you have already cleared on their own and return with rewards.

title:
Logistic
<SIZE=25>Support</SIZE>
sub_title: Obtain additional supplies through logistic missions.

title:
Combat
<SIZE=25>Simulation</SIZE>
sub_title: Different Combat Simulations are available on different days; please clear them as needed.

title: Defense Drills
sub_title: Command your echelons to defend against infinite waves of enemies.

title: Coalition Drill
sub_title: You can obtain items for cultivating Coalition Units by using preset T-Dolls in battle.

title: Target Practice
sub_title: You can test the strength of your echelons here.

title: Events
sub_title: Different events take place on an irregular basis. Keep an eye out for them!

title: Battlefield Guide
sub_title: You must understand the rules and techniques of each battle.

title: Combat Summary
sub_title: It is expected of every commander to make ample preparations before each battle.

title: Echelon Deployment
sub_title: Deploying your echelons is the first step in each battle.

title: Actions and Capturing Nodes
sub_title: Each step you take is a step closer to victory.

title: Re-supplying and Retreat
sub_title: It is better for your T-Dolls if you re-supply your echelons regularly and know when to retreat.

title: T-Dolls in Battle
sub_title: You can direct the movements of your T-Dolls when they're in combat.

title: Support Echelons
sub_title: An excellent Commander never refuses help from a friend.

title: Planning Mode
sub_title: Using the Planning Mode wisely can streamline the process of your battle.

title: Battlefield Intelligence Mode
sub_title: Know the enemy and know yourself; in a hundred battles you will never be in peril.

title: Fairies in Battle
sub_title: Using your Fairies wisely can help you turn the tables in a battle.

title: HOC in Battles
sub_title: HOC may possess impressive firepower, but they are not capable of fighting on their own.

title: Coalition Units in Battle
sub_title: Coalition Units are slightly different than T-Dolls. Pay attention when commanding them in battle.

title: Friend's Echelon
sub_title: Sometimes your friends' echelons will enter the fray. Stand side by side and fight together!

title: Battlefield Facilities
sub_title: A Commander should learn how to use the facilities on the battlefield to their advantage.

title: Special Positions
sub_title: Different positions will affect the nodes around it. Watch out and handle with care depending on the situation.

title: Control Panels & Defense Gates
sub_title: Defense Gates can cut off certain routes. They can be controlled using the Control Panels.

title: Abandoned Goliaths, Rubble & Thoroughfares
sub_title: Abandoned Goliaths can blow up obstacles to open up a path; they can also demolish a Thoroughfare and seal it off.

title: Abandoned Buildings, Detonators & Ruins
sub_title: Abandoned Buildings can provide cover for the echelon standing on the node. They will turn into Ruins upon detonation.

title: Transformers & EMP Generators
sub_title: After charging an EMP Generator at a Transformer, it can be used to carry out an EMP attack on surrounding enemies.

title: EMP Grenades
sub_title: After throwing an EMP Grenade, you can carry out an EMP attack on the target.

title: Force Field Generators
sub_title: Force Field Generators provide force field support for echelons.

title: Coastal Defense Artillery
sub_title: Coastal Defense Artillery can provide support for echelons within range. You can also attack targets by operating them manually.

title: Interplane Elevator
sub_title: The Interplane Elevator can take you between different floors.

title: Teleport Node
sub_title: The Teleport Node will transport your echelon to another Teleport Node.

title: Mysterious Rabbit Hole
sub_title: Once you go down the Mysterious Rabbit Hole, you will fall down a level.

title: Operation Objectives
sub_title: Each mission has its own objective. Double-check before you begin a battle.

title: Killing Targets
sub_title: Kill the target unit(s) to win the battle.

title: Turn Limit
sub_title: Time is short. Don't let any turn go to waste.

title: Capturing Nodes
sub_title: Capture target nodes to win a battle.

title: Baiting Tactics
sub_title: Make use of enemy units' logic of pursuit to your advantage and draw them to specific nodes.

title: Rescuing Hostages
sub_title: Rescue hostages and retreat to safety.

title: Maintaining Supply Lines
sub_title: Establish a supply line between the Command Post and the Supply Point.

title: Survival Missions
sub_title: Survival is victory.

title: Echelon Formation
sub_title: Assign suitable T-Dolls into your echelons to maximize their strength.

title: Formation
sub_title: T-Dolls synergize with each other. A good formation makes for a strong echelon.

title: Quick Formation
sub_title: When you're not sure how to put together an echelon, the Quick Formation feature can be of help.

title: Coalition Unit Formation
sub_title: Coalition echelons rely heavily on the team leader's command. Build an echelon around the leader.

title: Coalition Unit Quick Formation
sub_title: Quick Formation can also be used to put together an echelon of Coalition Units.

title: Equipment preset
sub_title: You can switch equipment presets with a single click.

title: Base
sub_title: Browse and manage different affairs on the base.

title: DORM
sub_title: Welcome to the T-Doll Dormitory. Dress up your Dolls and interact with them regularly!

title: Procurement
sub_title: Don't stinge on your tokens.

title: Dormitory Customization
sub_title: On top of your capability on the battlefield, show your Dolls how good you are at decorating their dorms!

title: Giving Gifts
sub_title: Give your Dolls gifts regularly to show encouragement.

title: Visit Dorm
sub_title: Visit other Commanders' Dormitory and say hello.

title: Battery
sub_title: Batteries are very important resources for development. You need them for constructing different facilities in the base.

title: Data Room
sub_title: Kalina can turn your surplus EXP into Combat Reports.

title: Cafe
sub_title: Brew a cup of coffee and listen to the Dolls tell their stories.

title: Rescue Station
sub_title: Adopt stray animals and give them a loving home.

title: Fairy Chamber
sub_title: You can manage all Fairy-related facilities in the Fairy Chamber.

title: Forward Basecamp
sub_title: Dispatch T-Dolls on explorations to obtain rare resources.

title: Garage
sub_title: You can access and manage your HOC in the Garage.

title: Intelligence Center
sub_title: Analyzing samples at the Intelligence Center is the best way to obtain HOC.

title: Protocol Control Center
sub_title: You can manage all facilities related to Coalition Units in the Protocol Control Center.

title: Coalition Forces
sub_title: With Griffin's newest technology, it is now possible to recruit and deploy units from other factions into battle.

title: Coalition Units in Battle
sub_title: Coalition Units are slightly different than T-Dolls. Pay attention when commanding them in battle.

title: Coalition Unit Formation
sub_title: Coalition echelons rely heavily on the team leader's command. Build an echelon around the leader.

title: Coalition Unit Acquisition
sub_title: Diversify your troops by obtaining Coalition Units!

title: Coalition Unit Analysis
sub_title: Conduct analysis using identical Coalition Units to increase their performance in combat.

title: Coalition Unit Development
sub_title: Increase your Coalition Units' stats through development.

title: Tactical Chip
sub_title: Tactical Chips can make a significant difference. Use them wisely depending on the situation.

title: Data Transfer
sub_title: You can conduct Data Transfers between two identical Coalition Units.

title: Coalition Drill
sub_title: You can obtain items for cultivating Coalition Units by using preset T-Dolls in battle.

title: Disassembly and Exchange
sub_title: Dismantle surplus Coalition Units and exchange the resources for other items at the Kernel Store.

title: Protocol Control Center
sub_title: You can manage all facilities related to Coalition Units in the Protocol Control Center.

title: Factory
sub_title: Produce T-Dolls and equipment at the Factory to strengthen your echelons.

title: T-Doll Production
sub_title: Spend resources to obtain more T-Dolls.

title: Dummy Link
sub_title: Dummy-Linking your T-Dolls can improve their performance in battle and increase their EXP gain.

title: Coalition Unit Analysis
sub_title: Conduct analysis using identical Coalition Units to increase their performance in combat.

title: T-Doll Enhancement
sub_title: Enhance your T-Dolls to increase their stats.

title: Coalition Unit Development
sub_title: Increase your Coalition Units' stats through development.

title: Retirement and Disassembly
sub_title: Dismantle surplus Dolls and equipment for more resources.

title: Produce Equipment
sub_title: Spend resources to obtain more equipment.

title: Research
sub_title: Further improve your T-Dolls and their equipment through research and development.

title: Skill Training
sub_title: Enhance a unit's skill through training.

title: Equipment Enhancement
sub_title: Enhance your equipment to increase their stats.

title: Equipment Calibration
sub_title: This gives an opportunity to change the stats on your equipment.

title: Fairy Enhancement
sub_title: Enhance your Fairies to improve their performance in battle.

title: Fairy Calibration
sub_title: You can change a Fairy's Talent through Calibration.

title: Neural Upgrade
sub_title: Limit-Break your T-Dolls.

title: Community
sub_title: A Griffin Commander is never alone.

title: Friend
sub_title: It doesn't hurt to have more friends.

title: ID Card
sub_title: Make your name a memorable one!

title: Support Echelon
sub_title: An excellent Commander never refuses help from a friend.

title: Commander's Wardrobe
sub_title: Even though you're busy with your work, don't forget to buy yourself some new clothes.

title: Commander Costume
sub_title: A change of clothes and a change of pace.

title: Outfit Skills
sub_title: Changing into a gorgeous outfit seems to have awakened some incredible powers.

title: Dye System
sub_title: Not happy with the colors of your outfit? Try the dyes.

title: Dormitory Display
sub_title: Visit the Dormitory after you've changed into a new outfit.

title: Forward Basecamp
sub_title: Fighting is too much hard work? Then try the Forward Basecamp!

title: Forward Basecamp Introduction
sub_title: Dispatch T-Dolls on explorations to obtain rare resources.

title: Exploration Preparation
sub_title: Prepare for explorations carefully to maximize your gain.

title: Black Market Shop
sub_title: You can exchange your items for other rewards at the Black Market.

title: Special Bond Stories
sub_title: Get to know Griffin and you Dolls better.

title: Memory Collection
sub_title: Do you want to learn more about what happened among your Dolls?

title: Base Overview
sub_title: Have a look at the internal structure of the Griffin Base.

title: Luffberry chess
sub_title: A chess game that is both strategic and entertaining.

title: Game Mode
sub_title: There are multiple game modes, such as Casual, Competitive, and Practice.

title: Board Description
sub_title: Understand the features of the board and make good use of the terrain.

title: Echelon Preset
sub_title: Form your own echelon of personalized pieces.

title: Starting the Game
sub_title: Half the game is won with a good start.

title: Air-Drop Supply
sub_title: Regular Air-Drop Supplies are your strongest aid in the game.

title: Placing the Pieces
sub_title: The pieces are the main cast of this game.

title: Store Phase
sub_title: Purchase cards at the Store to enhance your pieces.

title: Turns and Phases
sub_title: Let's learn the basics of this game.

title: Victory Condition
sub_title: March on, to victory!

title: Gachapon
sub_title: Commanders can obtain Gachapon Tickets from Luffberry Chess, which can be used to draw rewards at the Gachapon Machine.

title: Theater Conquest
sub_title: Large-scale battle drills that put Commanders' abilities fully to the test.

title: Theater Introduction
sub_title: Theaters are large-scale battle drills facilitated by IOP.

title: Theater Facilities
sub_title: Upgrade Theater facilities to obtain points and buffs for echelons.

title: Theater Reconnaissance
sub_title: Conduct reconnaissance to obtain Theater points.

title: Theater Echelon Formation
sub_title: Theater Echelons consist of an Expedition Team, backup T-Dolls and support forces.

title: Theater Stages
sub_title: Analyzing information of different Theater stages carefully will make your battles much easier.

title: Theater Battles
sub_title: Complete Theater battles to obtain Theater points and materials.

title: Theater Rewards
sub_title: There are three kinds of Theater rewards: conquest rewards, point rewards, and ranking rewards.

title: Electronic Battles
sub_title: Casualties are not logged in electronic battles. T-Dolls regenerate automatically after each battle.

title: Defense Battles
sub_title: Clear the stage by surviving for a certain period of time.

title: Sniper Battles
sub_title: Clear the stage by eliminating specified targets.
